au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=10m_AUg2014
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5) # Drive detector to short position #sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(9200,0) # Drive guide to g4 config driveGuide(guideConfig.g4) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for g5) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 12.5 mm sics.drive('apx', -98) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) sics.set('beamcenterx', 93) sics.set('beamcenterz', 97.3)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(16, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(16,0) driveBsz(265.5)
